sentence: With Hard Work, We Can Win In November Abrams voting rights group has banked $19.5 million heading into 2022 election year The voting rights group Stacey Abrams founded after losing the 2018 gubernatorial election to Brian Kemp reported this week that it ended 2021 with $19.5 million in the bank as she prepares to seek a rematch with the governor.
title: When Your Worldview is too Big, The World Seems Overwhelming: Saturday's GNR

sentence: With Hard Work, We Can Win In November Abrams voting rights group has banked $19.5 million heading into 2022 election year The voting rights group Stacey Abrams founded after losing the 2018 gubernatorial election to Brian Kemp reported this week that it ended 2021 with $19.5 million in the bank as she prepares to seek a rematch with the governor.
title: When Your Worldview is too Big, The World Seems Overwhelming: Saturday's GNR

sentence: The 2018 race for governor in Georgia ended in a bitter dispute between Brian Kemp, a Republican who was serving as secretary of state at the time, and Stacey Abrams, the Democratic challenger who accused the state of voter suppression.
title: Georgia's 2018 Rematch, in a Courtroom
